channel.title: RIP Silver Lining
channel.description:
[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=58860]Silver Lining[/url] has passed away.
He committed suicide. I don't know the exact reasons, but he was obviously a troubled kid. Let me say though, I HATE people who fake their deaths, but this is not fake at all. I am being completely truthful and I am [b]not[/b] just making this up with him.
His sister logged into his MSN and was contacting people looking for answers to his death. Naturally we did not believe it due to the large amount of fake deaths that occur here. Mopman asked for their phone number so that we could call, and so we got it. I called the number and asked for Jordan (Silver Lining) and she said this was his sister. She said her mom would like to speak to me about his death. So she went to hand over the phone, and I instantly hung up because I was shocked that this was real. I had a long talk with his sister afterwards on MSN.
I'm not asking anyone to care, but be nice if you are going to post here.
RIP
EDIT- Removed obituary due to fucktards spamming the guestbook.

item.title: RIP Silver Lining
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:287, topic:209136”][quote author=jme link=topic=275521.msg2265065#msg2265065 date=1212955194]
I find the stuff people are posting on his obituary guest book is horrible:

"I Didn’t Knew Jordan That Well We Only Talked A Bit Sometimes On Irc It Was Fun Never Knew This Would Happen R.I.P… "

“Rip jordan i dident know you well on mopar but you will be missed
tehsilabnoob”

Etc. It’s bad enough were spamming a page thats meant for his family and friends, they don’t need idiots who can’t even spend an extra 10 seconds writing something that actually makes sense, or even putting any thought into spelling and grammar.
[/quote]
This is exactly why I have requested once on the forums and a couple of times on irc for the removal of the links in this topic.[/quote]

I just removed the two I posted, although jme probably should remove the one in his original post.

I didn’t know that people would abuse them like that.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Silver Lining
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

This is a tragedy. I’m so sorry for this family… If you guys read this, I’m sorry for all of the hate and immaturity in this thread. We all respect him greatly, and love him even if we knew him or not, we are a community. I never really knew him, but committing suicide is horrid. I feel for you all and I’ll be praying for you.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Silver Lining
item.dc:creator: @anarkia anarkia
item.description:
@anarkia wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:283, topic:209136”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=275521.msg2261711#msg2261711 date=1212803097]

problem is Java C++ VB and all this stuff induces large amounts of stress being why i feel 10 years older than i am well the thing is this just goes to show dont code unless your ready for stress induced head achs thats why i meditate relive the stress and have time to thing it out and discover some new stuff.

Wow I thought it was just me who got stressed from coding, although I seriously don’t think that’s why sL committed suicide. Just because you know him from the internet, doesn’t mean that his whole life revolves around it.

A stress section would fail really badly because of all the elitist pricks on these forums. Everytime someone posts with a problem, they would just be flamed for being “weak”.
[/quote]

He had like almost no friends and stuff too.[/quote]

that tends to happen to people when they get too addicted to something- its good to enjoy this- but its better to enjoy life

Read full topic
